filmography.title: Morning Glory
filmography.plot: A naive, aspiring actress travels to New York to become a star.

filmography.title: Little Women
filmography.plot: The four March sisters grow up in New England during the Civil War.

filmography.title: Bringing Up Baby
filmography.plot: A paleontologist is pursued by a flighty heiress and her pet leopard.

filmography.title: The Philadelphia Story
filmography.plot: A socialite's wedding plans are complicated by the arrival of her ex-husband.

filmography.title: Woman of the Year
filmography.plot: Two journalists with opposing views fall in love and try to balance careers.

filmography.title: The African Queen
filmography.plot: A gin-swilling riverboat captain and a missionary take on a German gunboat.

filmography.title: Sudden Last Summer
filmography.plot: A wealthy matriarch tries to lobotomize her niece to cover up a family secret.

filmography.title: Long Day's Journey Into Night
filmography.plot: An agonizing day in the life of the drug-addicted Tyrone family.

filmography.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
filmography.plot: A couple's liberal views are tested when their daughter brings home a black fiancé.

filmography.title: The Lion in Winter
filmography.plot: King Henry II and Eleanor of Aquitaine battle over which son will succeed the throne.

filmography.title: A Streetcar Named Desire
filmography.plot: A fading Southern belle clashes with her brutish brother-in-law.

filmography.title: Viva Zapata!
filmography.plot: The rise and fall of the Mexican revolutionary leader Emiliano Zapata.

filmography.title: Julius Caesar
filmography.plot: The growing ambition of Julius Caesar is a source of concern to his close friend Brutus.

filmography.title: On the Waterfront
filmography.plot: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

filmography.title: Guys and Dolls
filmography.plot: A gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana.

filmography.title: The Young Lions
filmography.plot: The destiny of a German soldier and two Americans intertwine during WWII.

filmography.title: The Godfather
filmography.plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

filmography.title: Last Tango in Paris
filmography.plot: A young Parisian woman meets a middle-aged American businessman who demands their relationship be based only on sex.

filmography.title: Superman
filmography.plot: An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first superhero.

filmography.title: Apocalypse Now
filmography.plot: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel.

filmography.title: The Deer Hunter
filmography.plot: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town.

filmography.title: Kramer vs. Kramer
filmography.plot: Ted Kramer's wife leaves him, allowing for a lost bond with his son to be rediscovered.

filmography.title: Sophie's Choice
filmography.plot: Sophie is a survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

filmography.title: Silkwood
filmography.plot: A worker at a plutonium processing plant is purposefully contaminated, psychologically tortured and possibly murdered to prevent her from exposing worker safety violations.

filmography.title: Out of Africa
filmography.plot: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

filmography.title: The Bridges of Madison County
filmography.plot: Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson for four days in the 1960s.

filmography.title: Adaptation.
filmography.plot: A lovelorn screenwriter becomes desperate as he tries and fails to adapt 'The Orchid Thief' by Susan Orlean for the screen.

filmography.title: The Devil Wears Prada
filmography.plot: A smart but sensible new graduate lands a job as an assistant to Miranda Priestly, the demanding editor-in-chief of a high fashion magazine.

filmography.title: Doubt
filmography.plot: A Catholic school principal questions a priest's ambiguous relationship with a troubled young student.

filmography.title: The Iron Lady
filmography.plot: An elderly Margaret Thatcher talks to the imagined presence of her recently deceased husband as she struggles to come to terms with his death.
